WorkItem.Description:
When I try to Load a HtmlDocument from a Stream, it doesn't load correctly.
I want to load from a MemoryStream. I also tried FileStream and the result is the same: the HtmlDocument isn't null, but it doesn't have any nodes.
Â 
When I load the same file in the FileStream with the Load(string) method, it loads sucessfully. I don't know what's wrong or if it is an issue.

Comments.Message:
Forget it!
I'm the biggest dumbass... lol
I had to set the Position to 0 on the MemoryStream.
